import React, { Component } from 'react'; import faqs from '../../../data/faqs.json'; import { Accordion, Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; class Content extends Component { render() { return (
{faqs.map((item, i) => (
{item.text}
{item.title} +
))}
{/* Page Sidebar */}
{/* Contact Widget */}
Contact Us
